name: FastHipsterShooter - Demo
description:
FastHipsterShooter - a 2D platformer-shooter-casual with a strange main character... ...And with strange customization: not clothes or some accessories, but tattoos ... better, pixel tattoos! 
Armed with a gun and go to the catacombs to shoot aggressive gray squares (but this is only the beginning) and defeat bosses. Use the mouse to aim at the enemy.
Fill the safe with coins or spend them on new guns and tattoos to be even cooler and shoot more aggressive gray squares!
